Question: Shenzhen Kingsun Enterprises Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Kingsun Enterprises Co., Ltd.

Product: Consumer electronic products and accessories
- Founded in 1995
- Provides integrated services including product design, R&D, production, and sales
- Focuses on R&D and sales of consumer electronic products and accessories
- Nearly 100 patents
- Export-oriented company with a diversified and complete product supply chain
- Offers professional OEM/ODM services
- Long-term strategic partnerships with a number of enterprises
- Dedicated to excavating differentiated products with high cost performance
- Serving hundreds of enterprises in America, Europe, Japan, and other countries and regions
